bug.short_desc: Playground doesn't work with the new code editor in FF2

long_desc.thetext:
Since the new code editor is used, the playground doesn't work anymore. A script error occurs. Maybe, we should deactivate the code editor for FF2.
Global Error Handler caught exception: require.js load timeout for modules: ace/Editor ace/VirtualRenderer ace/Document ace/mode/JavaScript ace/mode/Css ace/mode/Html ace/mode/Xml ace/mode/Text ace/UndoManager ace/ace ace/TextInput ace/KeyBinding ace/Search ace/BackgroundTokenizer ace/Range ace/MEventEmitter ace/lib/oop ace/lib/lang ace/layer/Gutter ace/layer/Marker ace/layer/Text ace/layer/Cursor ace/ScrollBar ace/Selection ace/Tokenizer ace/mode/JavaScriptHighlightRules ace/mode/MatchingBraceOutdent ace/mode/CssHighlightRules ace/mode/HtmlHighlightRules ace/mode/XmlHighlightRules ace/mode/TextHighlightRules ace/lib/core ace/lib/dom ace/lib/event ace/conf/keybindings/default_mac ace/conf/keybindings/default_win ace/PluginManager ace/commands/DefaultCommands ace/mode/DocCommentHighlightRules in http://172.17.12.142/qx/trunk/qooxdoo/application/playground/build/resource/playground/js/require.js line 836
